local_intent: Verify visibility of the T block, move to an overhead approach pose, then confirm the pose was reached.
assumptions: No obstacles between current pose and overhead pose
coherence_with_global: Matches global perception-first approach: checks/recovers block visibility, executes MoveAbove(t_block, 0.03, 1200), then verifies position with IsAt before subsequent yaw/alignment in the global plan.
